content.title: Mukhyamantri Bayan Jyoti Yojana
content.department: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
content.beneficiary: Bonafide weavers and full-time ancillary workers
content.details: The Mukhyamantri Bayan Jyoti Yojana aims to provide necessary illumination for weaving activities, improve the health of weavers, and enhance productivity.
benefits: Distribution of 20 watts tube lights free of cost.
Financial assistance of ₹ 17,500 for purchasing inverters.
Provision of a 35 watts fan to beneficiaries.
eligibility: Must be a bonafide weaver or full-time ancillary worker.
Family income must not exceed ₹ 3,00,000 per annum.
At least 50% of family income should be from weaving activities.
Must not have availed similar benefits from any government agency.
Must purchase the lighting unit from a GST-registered dealer.
Only one member of a family can benefit.
content.application_process: Online application through the Directorate's website. In remote areas, Zonal Officers will assist in application collection.
documents_required: Self-attested Weavers Identity Card or certificate.
Self-attested copy of the first page of the Savings Bank Passbook.
Certificate of total annual family income from the Tahasildar.
Affidavit stating no receipt of similar assistance.
Undertaking not to sell the lighting unit within three years.

faqs.question: Who are eligible for MBJY?
faqs.answer: Must be a bonafide weaver or full-time ancillary worker, permanent resident of Odisha, with family income not exceeding ₹ 3,00,000 per annum.

faqs.question: What are the benefits under MBJY?
faqs.answer: Distribution of 20 watts tube lights, ₹ 17,500 for inverters, provision of a 35 watts fan, and an interest-free loan of up to ₹ 5000.

faqs.question: Can application be filled in online mode?
faqs.answer: Yes, applications can be filled online through the Directorate's website.

faqs.question: What are the steps to apply?
faqs.answer: Visit the official website, create an account, login, provide required information, upload documents, and submit.
